title: (x) Moriah Films - Mantinia CC, Goudy Old Style {Eduardo}
content:
Hallo,   
is there anybody who knows which font is used here   
   
 ![moriah title](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221445im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21413.gif)   
   
both if possible?   
thank you very much!   
m.
author: manard

comments.content:
Mantinia (Mathew Carter)   
and Goudy OldStyle (Frederic Goudy).
